features: Inspired by the animated character in the popular Disney movie, this Moana doll is ready for an epic ocean adventure!
Kids can press Moana doll's necklace and join in as she sings a 30-second clip from her signature song from the film, in English: "How Far I'll Go."
Moana doll wears her signature outfit and comes with long, wavy hair for styling fun!
Makes a perfect gift for kids to play out their favorite movie moments or make up their own stories about Moana!
Fans can collect all the Disney singing dolls for the ultimate musical adventure! Each sold separately, subject to availability.
body.description: Inspired by the beloved Disney movie, this driven and independent Moana doll is ready for an epic ocean adventure! Fans will love to join their Moana doll as she sings her signature song in English, "How Far I'll Go." Wearing her classic necklace and outfit, this Moana doll sings with one press of a button. Kids can re-create their favorite movie moments or make up their own Moana stories. Doll cannot stand alone. Colors and decorations may vary.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: ​Hit the Right Notes at Playtime ​Kids can find their voice and tell stories of adventure with Moana doll who sings her signature song from the fan-favorite film!

​Simply press the button hidden in her necklace to hear her sing a 30-second clip from the inspiring song "How Far I'll Go" in English. Music lovers can sing along! ​Wearing her signature outfit from the Disney movie, Moana doll is perfect to re-create favorite scenes or to make up new stories to dive into! ​Kids will love to style her long, wavy hair, an authentic detail that captures her iconic look.

​Fun Forever After! ​Kids can collect all the Disney Princess dolls and discover more adventure and storytelling possibilities with these beloved and admired characters. Each sold separately, subject to availability.​

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Brought for nephews 2 yr old.It was a Moana themed party.She loved it!!!!!!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It calls me 🎶
reviews.reviewText: My daughter is obsessed with Moana!! We got this for her 2nd birthday and she loves it! My husband, not so much… she kept pushing the button to hear Moana sing nonstop! I really should’ve thought twice about giving this to her the day before we went on a 5hour road trip!! But that battery is still working!! I like that song so it doesn’t really bother me 😅 the quality is good! She got covered in sand and still works! I like that it plays more than 2 seconds of the song. It plays more than just the chorus so I think that helps.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Daughter loves it!
reviews.reviewText: My 3 year old loves this Moana! She sings a lot of the song too. It’s worth the money!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My granddaughter loves this doll

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Adorable princess doll!
reviews.reviewText: Pros:- Looks very close to Moana. This isn't a knock-off brand or anything, so I'm glad that it looks so much like Moana from the movie and my daughter instantly recognized her and was super excited!- No small parts, which makes this ideal for smaller kids, less so for older ones that want included accessories.- Sings 30 seconds of a song from the movie! That's just enough to not be annoying when played over and over and over again (because it will be). It doesn't end abruptly; there's a fade and it's at an appropriate spot in the song.- Lots and lots of hair! I love that is feels pretty soft, too! You can do lots of hair styles with this length and fullness.- Vibrant colors. The patterns do not look washed out or faded.Things to Consider:- The shirt is not fabric, it's plastic and cannot be removed. This isn't really a doll you'd dress up.- The skirt is a flimsy fabric. I do worry that the fringe will shred or tear at some point. I feel like this is a very common material for doll's clothes, though, so nothing out of the ordinary.Cons:- No accessories. Not even shoes. I know Moana doesn't wear shoes in the movies, but kids typically enjoy accessories.Overall thoughts:My daughter loves this doll! It's super cute and sings a song in good enough quality (not super tinny sounding) and at a good volume. She likes singing along and hugging the doll, but there isn't anything else that you can do with it, other than play with her hair, since there isn't any accessories included. At the very least, they should have packaged her with a hei-hei or pua doll. If this had included a couple themed accessories, it'd be a perfect product. I think a child who loves dolls and Moana would love to get this for a special occasion (or even just because).

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewText: My daughter is in love with this “Barbie” because it sings her favorite Moana song!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars One happy little girl
reviews.reviewText: My three year old daughter loves Moana and this made her so happy! Beautiful doll and great sound when she sings. Very happy with this.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024

reviews.reviewText: Beautiful doll sings a lot of the song once you take her out of the box .. until she’s out of the box she only sings a few words . I’m glad I read the review regarding a nightmare to get out of the box and I took the advice and took it out before I gave it as a gift . I found a quick way to do it .. split/Peel the bottom of the box open pops right open .. then cut the ties . 👍 beautiful hair 4yr old luvs her ! Worth the money and effort

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Granddaughter singing and dancing with doll constantly

reviews.reviewTitle: The song is authentic like the movie's.
reviews.reviewText: This the first doll my granddaughter has and the button makes it easy for her to activate the song. She loves it but grows tired of it because there is only one song.
Belle poupée, mais chante 2,3 mots seulement
